subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Mikhail D. Prokhorov is showing his determination to win at any cost: a high-profile trade helped raise the Nets’ payroll to $101 million, triggering a luxury tax bill of about $82 million.
snippet: Mikhail D. Prokhorov is showing his determination to win at any cost: a high-profile trade helped raise the Nets’ payroll to $101 million, triggering a luxury tax bill of about $82 million.
